```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(httr)
clrs <- MetBrewer::met.brewer(name = "Java")
clrs_lt <- colorspace::lighten(clrs, 0.9)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.retina = 3, collapse = TRUE)
options(digits = 3, width = 75)
```
